topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5420ffed6368724df47f0100#post_5420ffed6368724df47f0100
Before it was cool.

It's supposedly a rare model of of the Japanese WW2 Nambu pistol fitted with a sword. Totally impractical. And only one was ever recovered in war. It could easily have been a one-off custom weapon.
